title: severe_weather
description: Severe weather warnings threaten facility operations.

timeline.title: Weather Warning Issued
timeline.description: Local authorities issue severe storm warning with high winds and possible tornado. Monitor conditions.

timeline.title: Personnel Notification
timeline.description: Alert all staff of weather threat. Non-essential personnel prepare for early dismissal.

timeline.title: Building Secured
timeline.description: Secure all exterior doors and windows. Move personnel away from windows to interior rooms.

timeline.title: Power Backup Check
timeline.description: Test emergency generator and backup power systems. Prepare for potential power loss.

timeline.title: Storm Impact
timeline.description: Severe weather hitting facility. Maintain shelter-in-place. Monitor for damage reports.

timeline.title: Damage Assessment
timeline.description: Storm passing. Conduct preliminary damage assessment. Check for injuries and structural damage.
